name: Simple Discord Bot by Kamil Bakierzy≈Ñski
description: Discord Bot with users statistics, League of Legends API and Dashboard.

MAIN_TEXT_CHANNEL_ID.description: Main text channel id of your server. Need for displaying some commands.

AFK_CHANNEL_ID.description: Afk channel id. Need for saving data about minutes spent on server.

ADMIN_DISCORD_ID.description: Your discord id. Need to save data to cloud from discord chat.

RIOT_API_KEY.description: Riot Api Key for League of Legends functionality.

RAPID_API_KEY.description: Rapid Api Key for Coronavirus functionality.

GOOGLE_CLIENT_EMAIL.description: Google Client Email for Google Sheet API account.

GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Google Client Private Key for Google Sheet API account.

SPREADSHEET_ID.description: Google Spreadsheet ID for storing data.
